references.reason: This paper introduces the fundamental theory of diffusion models, which are the core of the image generation models discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly influential as it introduces a practical method for generating high-resolution images using diffusion models, which the target paper builds on.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component of many image-generation techniques, including those in the target paper, providing a powerful way to connect image and text data.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: ControlNet, presented in this paper, directly addresses the problem of controlling image generation by adding extra image-based conditioning and is directly relevant to the approach taken in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Ip-adapter: Text compatible image prompt adapter for text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: IP-Adapter, introduced here, is another relevant method for controlling the image generation process, whose concepts are used to improve the stylecode method described in the target paper.
